Uses of Package
io.atomix.resource

  • Packages that use io.atomix.resource 
    Package Description
    io.atomix
    Core Atomix APIs for creating and operating on distributed objects.
    io.atomix.collections
    Provides distributed collections such as DistributedMap DistributedMultiMap, DistributedQueue, and DistributedSet.
    io.atomix.collections.util  
    io.atomix.concurrent
    Provides distributed coordination resources such as DistributedLock.
    io.atomix.concurrent.util  
    io.atomix.group
    Provides distributed group operations tools via DistributedGroup including leader election, direct messaging, tasks queues, partitioning, and remote execution.
    io.atomix.group.messaging  
    io.atomix.manager
    Provides APIs for creating custom resources via ResourceClient.
    io.atomix.manager.options  
    io.atomix.resource
    Base classes and interfaces for creating and operating on replicated state machines in Atomix.
    io.atomix.testing  
    io.atomix.variables
    Provides distributed variables such as DistributedValue and DistributedLong.
    io.atomix.variables.util  
  • Classes in io.atomix.resource used by io.atomix 
    Class and Description
    Resource
    Base class for fault-tolerant stateful distributed objects.
    Resource.Config
    Base class for cluster-wide resource configurations.
    Resource.Options
    Base class for local resource options.
    ResourceType
    Identifier for resource metadata and state machine information.
  • Classes in io.atomix.resource used by io.atomix.collections 
    Class and Description
    AbstractResource
    Abstract resource.
    ReadConsistency
    Constants for controlling read consistency constraints on a per-request basis.
    Resource
    Base class for fault-tolerant stateful distributed objects.
    Resource.Config
    Base class for cluster-wide resource configurations.
    Resource.Event
    Resource event interface.
    Resource.EventType
    Resource event type.
    Resource.Options
    Base class for local resource options.
    ResourceTypeInfo
    Annotation for specifying resource state and serialization information.
  • Classes in io.atomix.resource used by io.atomix.collections.util
